org.bson.json

Class JsonWriterSettings.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bson.json.JsonWriterSettings.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    JsonWriterSettings

    public static final class JsonWriterSettings.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    A builder for JsonWriterSettings
    Since:
    3.5
